dashboard.label: Identity JIT — Trace end-to-end (IIQ ↔ PVWA ↔ AD ↔ Entra)
dashboard.description: Correlates IIQ requests, PVWA sessions, AD changes, and Entra updates.
dashboard.definition:
IIQ Requests (last 24h) index=iiq sourcetype=iiq:workflow action=request earliest=-24h | stats count by user, request_type, status
PVWA Sessions (last 24h) index=pvwa sourcetype=pvwa:psm action=session_start earliest=-24h | stats count by admin_sam, tier, approval_count
AD Changes via JEA index=windows sourcetype=wineventlog:security (EventCode=4738 OR EventCode=4728 OR EventCode=4729) | stats count by TargetUserName, EventCode
Entra ID Updates (Graph) index=graph sourcetype=graph:audit verb=PATCH resource=users | stats count by user, extensionAttribute10, extensionAttribute11, extensionAttribute12
